item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔拒绝透露任期届满后是否留任
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周四拒绝透露他是否会在2026年5月美联储主席任期届满后继续留任美国央行董事会成员。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Thursday declined to say whether he would remain at the U.S. central bank as a board member after his term as chief expires in May 2026.】

item.title: 早间新闻鲍威尔称无需急于进一步降息
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，花旗集团因与受制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁有关联而面临美国调查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，花旗集团正因与受制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁苏莱曼-阿布赛多维奇-克里莫夫（Suleiman Abusaidovich Kerimov）的关系而接受美国政府机构的调查。【原文：Citigroup is being probed by U.S. government agencies over its ties to sanctioned Russian billionaire Suleiman Abusaidovich Kerimov, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会的 Holyoak 对人工智能收集儿童数据表示担忧
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会委员梅丽莎-霍利约克（Melissa Holyoak）周四表示，鉴于隐私和安全问题，该机构应调查人工智能产品如何使用它们从年轻用户那里收集的数据。【原文：U.S. Federal Trade Commissioner Melissa Holyoak said on Thursday the agency should look into how artificial-intelligence products use the data they gather from younger users, amid privacy and safety concerns.】

item.title: 美国邮政局警告称必须继续削减成本，否则仍有可能被救助
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司周四表示，面对持续的赤字，该公司必须继续削减成本，否则将继续走向 "政府救助或我们所知的这一伟大组织的终结"。【原文：The U.S. Postal Service said Thursday it must continue to cut costs in the face of continuing red ink or will remain on the path to either "government bailout or the end of this great organization as we know it."】

item.title: 蓝色起源与 AST Spacemobile 签订新格伦火箭发射协议
item.description: 杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）的火箭公司蓝色起源（Blue Origin）周四宣布，已与卫星通信公司 AST Spacemobile 签订了一项多次发射协议，利用蓝色起源的新格伦（New Glenn）火箭 "在多年时间内 "部署该公司的直达蜂窝卫星。【原文：Jeff Bezos' rocket company Blue Origin has signed a multi-launch deal with satellite communication company AST Spacemobile to deploy the company's direct-to-cellular satellites "over a multi-year period" using Blue's New Glenn rocket, the companies announced Thursday.】

item.title: 美国私募基金要求特朗普过渡团队改革证券交易委员会并征收有利于增长的税收
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，对冲基金和私募股权公司的一个美国顶级游说团体周四要求唐纳德-特朗普的过渡团队审查 "有害的 "私募基金法规，并保留 "有利于增长的税收政策"。【原文：A top U.S. lobbying group for hedge funds and private equity firms on Thursday asked Donald Trump's transition team to review "harmful" private fund regulations and preserve "pro-growth tax policies," according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 需求疲软，应用材料公司预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: 应用材料公司（Applied Materials）周四预测第一季度营收低于华尔街预期，这表明市场对人工智能芯片以外的芯片制造设备需求低迷，导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌近 4%。【原文：Applied Materials forecast first-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, a sign of sluggish demand for the chipmaking equipment outside of AI-powered chips, sending its shares down nearly 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 伯克希尔咬住多米诺比萨，在股价回落中涉足 Pool
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周四表示，该公司在第三季度对多米诺比萨（Domino's Pizza）和Pool Corp进行了新的投资，尽管该公司从苹果（Apple）和美国银行（Bank of America）等股票中撤资。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway said on Thursday it made new investments in Domino's Pizza and Pool Corp in the third quarter, even as it retrenched from from stocks such as Apple and Bank of America .】

item.title: 鲍威尔：美联储有时间了解特朗普政策对经济的影响
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周四表示，由于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，美国央行在需要调整决策思路之前还有时间。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Thursday the U.S. central bank has time before it needs to adapt its policymaking thinking due to the return of President-elect Donald Trump to the White House.】

item.title: 美国财政部在拜登时代的最终外汇报告中未发现操纵汇率行为
item.description: 美国财政部周四在拜登政府向当选总统唐纳德-特朗普移交外汇管理权之前的最后一份半年度货币报告中说，在截至 6 月 30 日的一年中，没有任何美国主要贸易伙伴操纵本国货币。【原文：No major U.S. trading partner manipulated its currency in the year to June 30, the Treasury Department said on Thursday in the Biden administration's final semi-annual currency report before turning over policing of foreign exchange practices to President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: VIE 鲍威尔称经济强劲美联储无需急于降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周四表示，持续的经济增长、稳健的就业市场以及仍高于2%目标的通胀率，意味着美国央行无需急于降息，可以审慎考虑。【原文：Ongoing economic growth, a solid job market, and inflation that remains above the 2% target means the U.S. central bank does not need to rush to lower interest rates and can deliberate carefully, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国机器人出租车公司 Pony AI 在美国 IPO 寻求最高 45 亿美元估值
item.description: 中国自动驾驶公司 Pony AI 周四表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值最高可达 44.8 亿美元。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving firm Pony AI said on Thursday it was targeting a valuation of up to $4.48 billion in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称经济强劲美联储无需急于降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周四表示，持续的经济增长、稳健的就业市场以及仍高于2%目标的通胀率，意味着美国央行无需急于降息，可以审慎考虑。【原文：Ongoing economic growth, a solid job market, and inflation that remains above the 2% target means the U.S. central bank does not need to rush to lower interest rates and can deliberate carefully, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国刑事和民事机构正在调查波利市场
item.description: 一位知情人士周四表示，刑事和民事机构正在对 Polymarket 进行调查，这项调查早在美国总统大选之前就已开始，而美国总统大选也使博彩平台受到了关注。【原文：Criminal and civil authorities are probing Polymarket, a source with knowledge of the matter said on Thursday, in an investigation that predates the U.S. presidential election that put the betting platform under scrutiny.】

item.title: 美国财政部称大都会人寿就违反伊朗制裁达成和解
item.description: 美国财政部周四表示，总部位于纽约的保险公司大都会人寿旗下的美国人寿保险公司同意就其可能承担的 2,300 多起明显违反对伊朗制裁的民事责任达成和解。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Thursday that New York-based insurer MetLife's unit, American Life Insurance Company, agreed to settle its potential civil liability for over 2,300 apparent violations of sanctions against Iran.】

item.title: 文件显示，布里奇沃特在大选推动的反弹前加大了对银行的押注
item.description: 布里奇沃特联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）的证券文件显示，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选后出现反弹之前，该公司在第三季度的投资组合中增加了大银行的股票。【原文：Bridgewater Associates added shares of big banks to its portfolio in the third quarter, securities filings showed, ahead of a rally that followed Donald Trump’s victory in the U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 空客首席执行官称 SpaceX 无法通过欧洲反垄断测试
item.description: 航空航天集团空中客车公司（Airbus）负责人周四表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在火箭到卫星领域取得巨大成功的 SpaceX 公司如果必须在欧洲运营，将引发反垄断问题。【原文：Elon Musk's hugely successful rockets-to-satellites SpaceX venture would raise anti-trust concerns if it had to operate in Europe, the head of aerospace group Airbus said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普过渡团队考虑由现任和前任美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）官员担任该机构主席
item.description: 据四位知情人士透露，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普过渡团队的官员正在考虑由现任和前任商品期货交易委员会官员担任该机构主席。【原文：Officials on President-elect Donald Trump's transition team are considering current and former Commodity Futures Trading Commission officials for chair of the agency, according to four people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 波音聘请诺斯罗普高管接管五角大楼项目
item.description: 波音公司周四表示，已聘请前诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）高管科林-米勒（Colin Miller）担任公司防务业务部门幻影工程研究机构的负责人。【原文：Boeing said on Thursday it hired former Northrop Grumman executive Colin Miller to head its Phantom Works research arm within the company's defense business unit.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美国监管机构计划调查微软云计算业务
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引知情人士的话报道称，美国联邦贸易委员会正准备对微软云计算业务的反竞争行为展开调查。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is preparing to launch an investigation into anti-competitive practices at Microsoft's cloud computing business, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 共和党横扫后，DBRS 对美国财政状况 "更加警惕
item.description: 负责全球主权评级的董事总经理尼古拉-詹姆斯（Nichola James）周四告诉路透社，共和党在美国大选中的横扫使评级机构晨星DBRS对美国的财政状况 "更加警惕"。【原文：A Republican sweep in the U.S. elections puts rating agency Morningstar DBRS “more on alert” regarding the country’s fiscal accounts, managing director for global sovereign ratings Nichola James told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: TikTok 向全球广告商推出人工智能视频平台
item.description: ByteDance 旗下的 TikTok 周四宣布向全球所有广告商提供其人工智能视频创作平台 Symphony Creative Studios，该短视频应用希望借此提升其广告业务。【原文：ByteDance-owned TikTok on Thursday announced the global availability of its generative AI video creation platform, Symphony Creative Studios, to all advertisers, as the short-video app looks to boost its ad business.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普过渡团队旨在扼杀拜登电动汽车税收抵免政策
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士告诉路透社，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的过渡团队正计划取消针对购买电动汽车的 7500 美元消费者税收抵免，将其作为更广泛的税制改革立法的一部分。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump's transition team is planning to kill the $7,500 consumer tax credit for electric-vehicle purchases as part of broader tax-reform legislation, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，马斯克的 X 用户离开，Bluesky 吸引了数百万用户
item.description: 社交媒体平台蓝天（Bluesky）的用户数量正在增加数百万，因为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选美国总统后，人们纷纷逃离X，而且即将对服务条款进行的修改有可能使埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下平台面临的法律挑战变得更加复杂。【原文：Social media platform Bluesky is adding millions of users as people flee X after Donald Trump was elected U.S. President and as an upcoming change to the terms of service threatens to complicate legal challenges for the Elon Musk-owned platform.】

item.title: 谷歌为 iPhone 带来人工智能语音助手 Gemini Live
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周四在苹果应用商店（App Store）发布了一款人工智能聊天机器人智能手机应用，将最新一代语音助手引入了流行的移动操作系统。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Thursday released a smartphone app for its artificial intelligence chatbot on Apple's App Store that introduced the latest generation of its voice assistant to the popular mobile operating system.】

item.title: 被监管机构阻止或面临严格审查的美国交易
item.description: 在美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）提起诉讼后，Tapestry 放弃了以 85 亿美元收购 Michael Kors 所有者卡普里公司的计划，这是拜登政府最新的一次监管挤压。【原文：Tapestry abandoned its $8.5 billion bid for Michael Kors owner Capri after a judge blocked it following a lawsuit by the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC), in the latest regulatory squeeze under the Biden administration.】

item.title: 法官裁定卡夫亨氏必须面对 Mac & Cheese 诉讼
item.description: 一名联邦法官称，卡夫亨氏必须面对一项全国范围的集体诉讼，该诉讼指控卡夫亨氏声称其最知名的产品之一--卡夫奶酪通心粉不含人工防腐剂，从而欺骗了消费者。【原文：A federal judge said Kraft Heinz must face a proposed nationwide class action alleging that it defrauded consumers by claiming its Kraft macaroni and cheese, one of its best-known products, contains no artificial preservatives.】

item.title: 亚马逊进军远程医疗领域，Hims & Hers股价受挫
item.description: 在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）推出为远程医疗就诊提供预付费的竞争服务后，Hims & Hers Health 公司的股价周四暴跌 15%。【原文：Shares of Hims & Hers Health slumped 15% on Thursday after Amazon.com launched a rival service that offers upfront pricing for telehealth visits.】

item.title: 巴宝莉希望 "围巾吧"、泡芙夹克和经典款式能推动业绩扭亏为盈
item.description: 巴宝莉希望店内的 "围巾吧"、新系列的泡芙夹克，以及更加专注于经典产品而非新款时尚，能够帮助其品牌扭转颓势。【原文：Burberry is hoping "scarf bars" in its stores, new ranges of puffer jackets, and a sharper focus on its classic products rather than new fashions will help to turn its brand around.】
